sentences.sContent: I overheard part of their conversation.
sentences.sCn: 我碰巧听到了他们谈话的部分内容。

sentences.sContent: I couldn’t help overhearing your argument.
sentences.sCn: 我无意中听到了你们的争吵。

remMethod.val: over(额外的) ＋ hear(听) → 无意中听到

trans.tranOther: to accidentally hear what other people are saying, when they do not know that you have heard
